text: Danilia eucheliformis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Chilodontidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== THis species occurs in the Western Pacific. ==References== * Vilvens C. & Héros V. 2005. New species and new records of Danilia (Gastropoda: Chilodontidae) from the Western Pacific. Novapex 6(3) : 53–64 ==External links== * eucheliformis Category:Gastropods described in 1940
title: Danilia eucheliformis
